ERC_Predictor
  • API
  • View page source

API

src.analysis.load_database(path)

Loads a csv database from a given path.

src.analysis.print_df(df)

prints the basic information of a given data frame

src.analysis.renameCKDColumns(df)

Replaces all column default names for more legible ones. New names:'id','age', 'blood_pressure', 'specific_gravity', 'albumin', 'sugar', 'red_blood_cells', 'pus_cell','pus_cell_clumps', 'bacteria', 'blood_glucose_random', 'blood_urea', 'serum_creatinine', 'sodium', 'potassium', 'haemoglobin', 'packed_cell_volume', 'white_blood_cell_count', 'red_blood_cell_count', 'hypertension', 'diabetes_mellitus', 'coronary_artery_disease', 'appetite', 'peda_edema', 'anemia', 'classification'.

src.analysis.get_nan_per_col(df)

Iterates trough every column and caculates the percentage of nan values present in each column.

src.analysis.removeByNan(...)

Takes a series that contains all the columns name with the respective nan percentaje, then drops the columns that had nan content above the diven max nan limit.

src.analysis.drop_all_na(df)

Drops all rows that contains nan values

src.analysis.CategoricalVariablesTransformation(df)

Transforms categorical variables in the dataframe by replacing each unique value in a categorical column for an integer as a representation.

src.analysis.__yes_and_no_transform(df)

Assigns and replace all yes/no columns for 1/0 integers.

src.analysis.getDataAndTarget(target_col, df)

Splits the data frame into target(column name given) and data(main dataframe without target and id columns)

src.analysis.make_train_test_validation(...)

Splits the data frame into train, test & validation with the specified sizes.

src.analysis.print_splits_shapes(X_train, ...)

prints train, test & validation final dimentions.

src.analysis.base_svm_model(X_train, y_train)

Creates and trains a basic svm model.

src.analysis.svm_tunning(X_train, X_test, ...)

tunes the svm hiper parameters(C, gamma and kernel) to find the optimal for the desired prediction.

src.analysis.svm_clasification_report(data, ...)

prints a report for svm model according to a reference data and a svm predction

src.analysis.base_xgboost_model(X_train, y_train)

Creates and trains a basic xgboost model.

src.analysis.xgboost_tunning(X_test, ...)

tunes the hiperparameters of a given xgboost model.

src.analysis.xgboost_clasification_report(...)

prints a report for xgboost model according to a reference data and a xgboost predction

src.analysis.plot_feature_importance(model, ...)

graphs the given model importances based on the data.
